name: ENDIVA
description:
GAME:

You are a pilot of a small space ship equipped with a handy boost and utilizing a revolutionary fuel source - time. Collect crystalized time to top up your reserves. Time can also be used to repair your ship when it's damaged, however, if you run out of time - you die.

CONTROLS:

  • W, A, S, D  --  thrust in a given direction
  • MOUSE  --  control the direction that the ship is facing
  • R  --  repair ship using time
  • SPACE  --  boost forward
